title: Introduction to Business Management
description: Learn the basics of business management, including strategy, marketing, and finance.
prerequisitesDetails: No prior experience needed. Basic English and math proficiency recommended.
fullDescription: This course provides a foundational understanding of business management. You'll explore concepts in strategy, operations, marketing, and finance with real-world case studies and simulations.
learningOutcomes: Understand business structures and management functions
Apply basic marketing and financial principles

title: Fundamentals of Software Development
description: Master the fundamentals of software development, including programming and data structures.
prerequisitesDetails: Familiarity with file systems and internet browsing is helpful.
fullDescription: An introduction to software development using modern programming languages and concepts. You'll gain a solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and debugging techniques.
learningOutcomes: Write programs using core syntax and data structures

title: Digital Art and Design Basics
description: Explore the basics of digital art and design, including graphic design and illustration.
prerequisitesDetails: No prior experience in art or design is required.
fullDescription: A hands-on course teaching the principles of design, composition, and digital illustration. Perfect for beginners looking to start a career in digital arts.
learningOutcomes: Use digital tools to create artwork
Understand the principles of visual composition

title: Advanced Biology Concepts
description: Dive into advanced biology concepts, including genetics and molecular biology.
prerequisitesDetails: Prior completion of an introductory biology course is recommended.
fullDescription: Explore cell biology, genetics, and molecular systems in this intensive biology course designed for advanced high school or early college students.
learningOutcomes: Understand DNA replication and protein synthesis
Use lab simulations to model experiments

title: Healthcare Management Essentials
description: Understand the essentials of healthcare management, including operations and finance.
prerequisitesDetails: Open to all learners. No prior healthcare knowledge needed.
fullDescription: Gain an understanding of how hospitals, clinics, and healthcare organizations operate. The course includes healthcare systems, budgeting, patient safety, and leadership.
learningOutcomes: Analyze budgeting and finance in healthcare
Apply leadership principles in healthcare settings

title: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Develop your creative writing skills through workshops and feedback sessions.
prerequisitesDetails: Suitable for beginners. A passion for writing is helpful.
fullDescription: This course focuses on writing fiction and poetry. Engage in weekly writing prompts, feedback circles, and learn how to revise and refine your writing.
learningOutcomes: Apply literary techniques like metaphor and pacing
